scripts.fullstack-prod: NODE_ENV=prod concurrently --kill-others "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.fullstack-dev: set NODE_ENV=dev&&concurrently --kill-others "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.fullstack-install: npm install && npm --prefix ./backend install && npm --prefix ./frontend install
